text: John Ruuka (born 13 August 1995) is an I-Kiribati sprinter. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 100 metres race; his time of 11.65 seconds in the preliminary round did not qualify him for the first round. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:I-Kiribati male sprinters Category:Olympic athletes of Kiribati Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics
title: John Ruuka
